description.narrative: MoH and MCDMCH have the capacity to implement high impact nutrition interventions by 2015., which contributes to Community-Based Management Of Acute Malnutrition, Micronutrients, Prevention Of Stunting And Other Forms Of Malnutrition, Treatment Of Severe Acute Malnutrition. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Evaluations, Research And Data, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Children under five have increased their consumption of nutrient-dense food by 2015
